history.proof: unfold mscal. intros H. rewrite H. rewrite <- msum_sum. - hauto lq: on depth: 3use: msum_comm, mscal_comm. - sfirstorder depth: 3use: msum_comm, mscal_comm.

exceptions.exn: In environment X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X Hmonoid : monoid_theory m u n : nat x, y : X H : x ⊕ y = y ⊕ x Unable to unify "∑ ?M1459 ?M1460 ⊕ ?M1458 = ?M1458 ⊕ ∑ ?M1459 ?M1460" with "∑ n (fun _ : nat => y ⊕ x) = ∑ n (fun _ : nat => x ⊕ y)".

In environment X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X Hmonoid : monoid_theory m u n : nat x, y : X H : x ⊕ y = y ⊕ x Unable to unify "mscal ?M1458 ?M1459 ⊕ ?M1460 = ?M1460 ⊕ mscal ?M1458 ?M1459" with "∑ n (fun _ : nat => y ⊕ x) = ∑ n (fun _ : nat => x ⊕ y)".

In environment X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X Hmonoid : monoid_theory m u n : nat x, y : X H : x ⊕ y = y ⊕ x Unable to unify "x ⊕ y = y ⊕ x" with "∑ n (fun _ : nat => y ⊕ x) = ∑ n (fun _ : nat => x ⊕ y)".

original: unfold mscal. intros H. rewrite H. repeat rewrite mscal_S. rewrite <- msum_sum. apply msum_comm. intro i. intro Hi. apply mscal_comm. apply H.
